description: doc/go_faq.html: add entry about pointer to interface

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

https://codereview.appspot.com/7546050/diff/1/doc/go_faq.html File doc/go_faq.html (right): https://codereview.appspot.com/7546050/diff/1/doc/go_faq.html#newcode987 doc/go_faq.html:987: an interface, a pointer to an interface can never satisfy an interface. a pointer to an interface can satisfy the empty interface (e.g. to fmt.Printf)

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, bradfitz@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8aceadd26a0b ***

doc/go_faq.html: add entry about pointer to interface

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
